mapper.select: SELECT a.id as menuId, a.menuCode as menuCode, a.menuName as menuName, a.menuIcon as menuIcon, a.menuUrl as menuUrl, a.parentCode as parentCode, a.seqSort as seqSort FROM k12system_menu a WHERE a.parentCode = #{parentCode} AND a.`status` = 0 ORDER BY a.seqSort ASC
SELECT menuCode FROM k12system_role_menu WHERE status = 0 AND roleCode = #{roleCode}
